name: Regice
description: The Iceberg Pokémon. Regice's body was made during an ice age. The deep-frozen body can't be melted, even by fire. This Pokémon controls frigid air of -328 degrees Fahrenheit.

abilities.name: Clear Body
abilities.description: Other Pokémon's moves or abilities cannot lower this Pokémon stats.

abilities.name: Ice Body
abilities.description: While it is snowing or hailing, this Pokémon heals for an amount of HP equal to its proficiency modifier at the end of each of its turns.
